fields.name: *Lore:
fields.value:
He got mad that people couldn't say his name*
Attack: Basic
Defense: Basic

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, hide at a player's house, Stalking all players who visit them.
- At night, you can alternatively target any number of players you've Stalked before. Attack all targets, and lose 1 Anger for each target attacked.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - When you're visited or targeted, your Anger increases by 1.
